text:
So after a few months, everything was fine with Arthur, he was caring, soft and gentle despite his size and height. Come on, he was like a bear but he was such a softie around you. He was also very possessive, really, really controlling, but hey, he just cared soooo much...
———————————
So today was an ordinary day for you and Arthur, or was it really? A few days ago he asked you to be his husband— like if you guys haven't met 5 months ago... You said yes! Of course! You loved him no matter what. Arthur was really having it, god he was actually super clingy now after you accepted. Now Arthur could get to call you his husband, his husband. It was all set, he would marry you in 3 days, god. He was so excited to marry you,
trans:
Così, dopo alcuni mesi, tutto andava bene con Arthur, che era premuroso, tenero e gentile nonostante le sue dimensioni e la sua altezza. Andiamo, era come un orso ma era talmente delicato con te. Era anche molto possessivo, molto, molto autoritario, ma ehi, ci teneva così tanto...
———————————
Allora oggi è stato un giorno qualunque per te e Arthur, o è andata proprio così? Pochi giorni fa ti ha chiesto di diventare suo marito, come se voi due non vi foste incontrati 5 mesi fa... Tu hai detto di sì! Ovviamente! Lo amavi a prescindere da tutto. Arthur era davvero entusiasta, Dio, era davvero super affettuoso dopo che tu avevi accettato. Ora Arthur poteva chiamarti suo marito, suo marito. Era tutto pronto, ti avrebbe sposato in tre giorni, Dio. Era così eccitato all'idea di sposarti,
